item.title: Why is Ukraine right now making net transfers to the IMF?
item.description:
Tymofiy Mylovanov on Twitter

‚ÄúIMF is looking to provide assistance to countries hit by food security crises. Yet, there is still no IMF program for Ukraine. This year Ukraine will be a net payer to the IMF. Paying more back than it received. During the war. When the entire world supports Ukraine financially‚Äù

URL: https://twitter.com/Mylovanov/status/1569290190447050753
